name: html5-video-everywhere
title: HTML5 Video Everywhere!
description: Replace video player with Firefox native video player
author: Moez Bouhlel <bmoez.j@gmail.com> (http://lejenome.github.io/)

preferences.name: autoNext
preferences.title: Auto play next
preferences.description: Auto play the next Video on playlist

preferences.name: genYTSign
preferences.title: Decode YouTube Signature
preferences.description: Extract YouTube signature decoder from their video player, and use it to decode signatures

preferences.name: autoplay
preferences.title: Auto Play Video
preferences.description: Change default behaviour of the video player of the website

preferences.name: preload
preferences.title: Preload Video
preferences.description: Change default behaviour of the video player of the website in case it does not auto play the video

preferences.name: disableEmbed
preferences.title: Disable for Embed Youtube
preferences.description: Use default video player for embed videos
